Since 2014, we have crafted over 100 multimedia projects.

About us

50 unique performances crafted, with dozens of video projection solutions implemented.

We are a studio that turns the latest stage solutions and visual technologies into captivating stories. Specializing in 3D animation, we create shows by combining various technologies to achieve an exceptional effect.

Our goal is to amaze the audience, making each show unique and unforgettable. We aim for innovation and creativity, ensuring high-quality and engaging narratives in every project we undertake.

Our team has implemented many projects around the world.

We are available for you 24/7, no matter what time zone you are in.

CEO

We are creating a new type of art that operates on the level of future human perception, maximizing the saturation of airtime while at the same time infusing deep meanings into the narrative.

We began our journey in 2014 and since that time have created over 100 multimedia shows, installations, and various digital audio-visual solutions. We are forming a new vision at the intersection of live art, 3D animation, and the latest technologies.

These are new forms of immersive storytelling that impact viewers not just visually and auditorily, but on the level of consciousness.

Anatoliy Yeroheen CEO
